title: Ranked Stats
body: So I just finished a ranked match, and I clicked on my profile to see how much Lp I had gained just after being promoted only to see nothing at all, as if I hadn't finished placements. Am I the only one having this problem?

replies.body: Hey guys, is this still an issue?  The servers recently returned from maintenance and may have needed some time to boot everything up.  Relog and let me know!
It shows nothing on Alpha Client
im having the same issue too i was in placements now i cant check it out
Thank you, I was just confused and wasn't sure if I should keep playing not knowing if I'd actually gain Lp or not :b
Everyone is having this problem. Its preventing you from inviting duo partners as well. Since servers just came up they likely need another hour to resolve this.
As if I've never played ranked?
